participant_1.background:

Pizza is my favorite food.
I am single and not looking.

participant_2.background:
My brother works at best buy.
I love video games.
I have two cats , milo and fio.
My favorite sport is soccer.
I am canadian.

content.text: Soccer! I'm from Canada and it's a big sport here.
Oh, that's cool. I've never been to Canada, but I've heard it's a beautiful country.
It is! I love it here. What's your favorite subject in school?
Science! I love learning about how the world works.
That's awesome! I'm more of a math person myself.
I like math too! What's your favorite video game?
I love the Legend of Zelda series. I'm a big fan of fantasy games.
Oh, me too! I love the Legend of Zelda games. I've played them all.
That's awesome! I've only played a few of them, but I love them all.
I'm a big fan of suspense novels. What's your favorite book?
I love the Harry Potter series! I've read them all multiple times.
Oh, me too! I love the Harry Potter series. I've read them all too.
That's awesome! I'm glad to meet someone who's a fan of all the same things I am.
